Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan scored 144 runs with 8 wickets in 20 overs; Sri Lanka was at 28/1 after 6 overs with a required 117 runs in 84 balls; the match was being broadcasted by Ariana Television with several co-sponsors
Others: The match was the 32nd match in the Super 12 Group 1 of the T20 World Cup 2022
